pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distribution-Free Goodness-of-Fit Testing for Regression // Implements the distribution-free goodness-of-fit regression test for the mean structure of parametric models introduced in Khmaladze (2021) doi:10.1007/s10463-021-00786-3. The test is implemented for general functions with minimal distributional assumptions as well as common models (e.g., lm, glm) with the usual assumptions.
